exceptions.tactic: intros V f a b l H.
intros V' f a b l H.

original: intros V f a b l H. unfold KHInt. unfold is_KHInt in H. apply (iota_filterlimi_locally (fun ptd If => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd) = If) l). - unfold KH_fine. intros ptd1 ptd2 H1 H2. apply proof_irrelevance. - apply H.
